title: PeriodExtendedEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify a time period containing the additional value of Term.

oneOf.title: C
oneOf.description: CalculationPeriod - the period corresponds to the calculation period   For example, used in the Commodity Markets to indicate that a reference contract is the one that corresponds to the period of the calculation period.

oneOf.title: T
oneOf.description: Term. The period commencing on the effective date and ending on the termination date. The T period always appears in association with periodMultiplier = 1, and the notation is intended for use in contexts where the interval thus qualified (e.g. accrual period, payment period, reset period, ...) spans the entire term of the trade.
